entry.content:
Age of A.I(Science Documentary about Artificial Intelligence)

The Age of A.I. is a Science Documentary! which was narrated and hosted by Robert Downey Jr. This documenetary explains Important sub-domains Artificial Intelligence . Some of us might know about the technologies like Machine Learning,Deep Learning,Image Recognition,Object Detection,Reinforncement Learning,Speech Recognition are explained with real-world examples which is fascinating. They showed why Artificial Intelligence is a future for technology and how it is revolutionizing. Highly Recommended for A.I enthusiast!! I thank every reader of this blog
